name: Police Heavy Duty Street Gear
effect: Disadvantage to wearer's MOBILITY, STEALTH, OBSERVATION, CONNECTIONS, MANIPULATION.

name: Police Multi-Tool Bracer
effect: Includes tools and folding knife. Disadvantage to wearer's STEALTH.

name: Police Shield
effect: Disadvantage to close combat and ranged attacks from the front. Disadvantage to wearer's MOBILITY, STEALTH, CONNECTIONS, MANIPULATION.
